properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 2:55AM EST until February 3 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
4 to 7 ft.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Cape Lookout to Surf City.

* WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
